articles.title: Switzerland wins first gold medal in Men's Alpine Skiing
articles.summary: Franjo von Allmen claims Switzerland's first gold medal of Milano Cortina 2026 in Men's Downhill

articles.title: Italy celebrates double medal in opening day
articles.summary: Host nation Italy secures silver and bronze medals on the first day of competition

articles.title: Milano Cortina 2026 officially opens with spectacular ceremony
articles.summary: The 2026 Winter Olympics kick off with an unforgettable opening ceremony in Milan
